ygData.subject: Re: Unexpected benefit from PoA?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yield rule never got implemented, and I guaruntee you it will happen anytime a mid level wants to go camp a item the ywon t be able to. Verant seems to like
ygData.messageBody:
Yield rule never got implemented, and I guaruntee you it will happen anytime
a mid level wants to go camp a item the ywon't be able to. Verant seems to
like camping in the game because it just got worse. Oh I like the money
thing though time to go buy a good item with my 12k pp sitting in the bank.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, January 21, 2000 5:31 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Unexpected benefit from PoA?


>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>Well the "benefit" would be for the players who either don't have the time
>to camp the spawn points that drop good items or would rather just outright
>purchase the good items. I will admit that the people who try to camp
those
>sites and get the item for themself are likely to get frustrated. If this
>situation occurs, then the lower level charatcers could possibly use the
>/yield rule (assuming it ever got implemented).
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
> Heh benefit? Notice the one line go back to low level areas and camp
>items
>> for cash. The problem here is that were camping low levle areas how many
>> people are gonna be bitching now?
>>
>>
>>
>>
